item.title: Death of Google Reader - It's offline caching that makes RSS so good for me
item.description: It's what's on the inside that counts! For me, what makes RSS a success has been mobile apps with offline caching.

item.title: Whats the RSS Feed for a Custom Post Type?
item.description: WordPress introduced custom post types allowing creative and technical types to do more then just write pages and posts.
